ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and from the evil of the darkness when it gathers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the evil of evening darkness when it overspreads,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: from the evil of night's darkness when it spreads around;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I seek His protection against the evil of the invading darkness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And from the evil of the matter that darkens when it sets.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And from the evil of the Ghasiq when Waqab,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And from the evil of the utterly dark night when it comes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: from the evil of darkness when it gathers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: From the evil of the darkness when it is intense,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: from the evil of darkness as it descends,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And from the evil of the darken when it cometh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and from the evil of the dark night when it falls,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: From the mischief of Darkness as it overspreads;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness; (or the moon as it sets or goes away).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: from the evil of the darkness when it gathers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And from the evil of the darkness as it gathers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [113:3] and from the evil of darkness when it gathers, that is, [from] night when it becomes dark and the moon when it is absent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 778 (From the evil of the darkness when it is intense,
